1.text: Pull off as much of the sticker as possible first.

2.text: Cover your work space in newspaper.

3.text: Place the stainless steel item flat on your work space, if possible.

4.text: Soak a portion of soft cloth in mineral, baby or olive oil.
4.vid: /7/7a/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Dab or spray the oil on the sticker and let it sit.
5.vid: /2/2a/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Use the oiled cloth to wipe the adhesive off the surface.
6.vid: /0/04/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4

7.text: Apply a new layer of oil if part of the adhesive remains.
7.vid: /b/b7/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 6 Version 5.360p.mp4

8.text: Wipe the oiled cloth across the entire stainless steel surface.
8.vid: /b/ba/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 7 Version 5.360p.mp4

9.text: Use an open flame to heat up the sticker.
9.vid: /4/4e/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

10.vid: /b/bd/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

11.text: Wipe away the residue with coconut oil.
11.vid: /5/5c/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 10 Version 5.360p.mp4

12.text: Dab rubbing alcohol onto a paper towel and lay it over the sticker.
12.vid: /d/d6/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 11.360p.mp4

13.text: Scrub the sticker with the paper towel.
13.vid: /6/63/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 12.360p.mp4

14.text: Scrape any remaining adhesive with your fingernail.
14.vid: /0/0f/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 13 Version 3.360p.mp4

15.text: Soak the corner of a soft cloth in vinegar and wipe the surface.
15.vid: /b/bd/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 14 Version 3.360p.mp4

16.text: Wipe the surface with a cloth soaked with warm water.
16.vid: /3/31/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 15.360p.mp4

17.text: Wipe the surface completely with a dry cloth.
17.vid: /f/fd/Remove a Sticker from Stainless Steel Step 16.360p.mp4
